zh: 你正在报道 2025 年北加州山火事件。雷击引发多点火情，强风推动火线向沿海扩散，空气质量迅速恶化。社交媒体出现“化工仓库爆炸”的传闻，但官方尚未证实。官方简报与现场描述存在细节差异，数据随时间变化。你需要在时间压力下取证、核实、平衡官方数据与现场观察，避免放大未经核实的信息。你的目标是帮助读者理解火势、风险、救援与民生影响，同时明确哪些信息仍待确认。
en: You are reporting on the 2025 Northern California wildfires. Lightning sparked multiple fires, strong winds pushed the firelines toward the coast, and air quality deteriorated rapidly. Social media spread a "chemical warehouse explosion" rumor, but officials have not confirmed it. Official briefings and on-the-ground accounts diverge on some details, and data is changing over time. Under time pressure, you must verify facts, balance official data with observations, and avoid amplifying unverified claims. Your goal is to help readers understand the fire, risks, response efforts, and public impact while clearly stating what remains unconfirmed.
